div.p: The left frame contains all includes for your product. To edit one include, select it and the right frame will appear.

td.stdimg: The Includes page of the editor.

tr.td: Box No. 1 contains the branch and backup options. The branch options allow the create or delete product specific branches, with to backup options you can return to previous versions of the current include.
Box No. 2 shows all pages which user the current includes. To edit one of these pages, select it and it will be opened in the Pages page.
Box No. 3 lists all includes which are used by the current includes. After clicking on such an include it will be opened in the same page.
Box No. 4 displays all images which are use by the current include. To edit an image select it and it will be opened in the Images page.
Box No. 5 shows the whole content of the current target.
